con:xmlEntry.con:xml-content: <?xml version = '1.0' encoding = 'UTF-8'?> <!DOCTYPE properties SYSTEM "http://java.sun.com/dtd/properties.dtd"> <properties> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.LATITUDE:db_column_not_null">true</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.NAME:db_column_type">VARCHAR2</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.SHORTNAME:db_column_size">50</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.NAME:db_column_not_null">true</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.LATITUDE:db_column_precision">0</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.ID:db_column_type">NUMBER</entry> <entry key="return_single_result_set">false</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.NAME:db_column_size">150</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE:db_table_type">TABLE</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE:db_column_4">LONGITUDE</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE:db_column_3">LATITUDE</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.LONGITUDE:db_column_type">NUMBER</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE:db_column_2">SHORTNAME</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.LONGITUDE:db_column_precision">0</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE:db_column_1">NAME</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE:db_column_0">ID</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.LATITUDE:db_column_type">NUMBER</entry> <entry key="root_descriptor_alias">DRUGSTORE</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.LONGITUDE:db_column_not_null">true</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.SHORTNAME:db_column_type">VARCHAR2</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.ID:db_column_precision">0</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.ID:db_column_not_null">true</entry> <entry key="DRUGSTORE.SHORTNAME:db_column_not_null">false</entry> </properties>
